bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXIX (Nos 2878-2891)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXIX (Nos 2878-2891). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 55.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1972, 8°, xii-60 pp. et VI pll.

C.R. par Ignazio Cazzaniga, PP 27 (1972) fasc. 145, pp. 281-288. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 46 (1974) pp. 646-651. - Paul Mertens, BibO 32 (1975) pp. 211-212. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 55 (1975) pp. 291-303 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXVIII, XL, XLI et XLII). - J. Pegueroles, StPap 12 (1973) pp. 111-112. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 48 (1973) No. 95, pp. 179-180.
